rooms.description: A small entrance hall with Vastu-aligned entry door facing the east to invite positive energy
Spacious living room in Art Deco style with geometric patterns and chrome finishes. It features a seating area near the large window for natural light.
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen with minimalistic decor influenced by Art Deco aesthetics.
Compact yet functional kitchen with essential cabinetry. Designed to be efficient on a tight budget.
Master bedroom with built-in storage and an ensuite bathroom. The layout is optimized to ensure privacy.
Child bedroom designed to maintain Vastu principles by aligning the bed in the south-east corner.
Guest bedroom with a small study area. Decor reflects Art Deco motifs using affordable materials.
Additional bedroom designed for versatility and future expansion.
Spare bedroom with a focus on energy efficiency and natural light.
